name: Percussive VR
description:
Percussive VR is a collection of virtual instruments you can play in your home! Learn, practice, perform, or just play — your own creativity is the limit.Instruments
  • Marimba
  • Steelpan / Steel Drums
  • Glockenspiel
  • More to come!
Features
  • Different mallets (for different types of sound)
  • Third person view (so your friends can follow your performance)
  • Musical easter eggs (they're a secret to everybody...)
  • More to come!
